Blog 5

Published on Mar 6, 2020

    Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS)

    Installing RDS on amazon web service. RDS provides a rational database in the cloud which is very accessible and scalable.

    login into your AWS account Now you can search for RDS at the AWS Management Console Your dashboard Click on DB instances and then on Create Database There is two option when creating DB standard create, and easy create, for now, choose standard create Choose your engine, I will use Mysql I will use the free tier for testing Create db name, Master-user, password DB instance size db.t2.micro, Storage 8 gb, Storage Autoscaling disable Because we are only testing, Availability and Durability we will not create standby instance and for Connectivity, I will use default VPC Choose your preference, Password authentication or Password and IAM database authentication. Review and click create In few minutes AWS will create your RDS.
